context: Message that appears after reloading config
Message that appears after using command /pm read with some offline messages
Message that appears after using command /pm read with no offline messages
Hover text for message after using command /pm read with some offline messages

source_string: §aPlayer §b%1$s§a is offline. He will receive your message when log in.
translation: §aИгрок §b%1$s§a не в сети. Он получит сообщение, когда зайдет на сервер.
context: Message that appears after sending a private message to a player who is not currently on the server
Message that appears after using command /pm history with no messages in history
Title for message that appears after using command /pm history
Message that appears after clearing private messages history
Message that appears after sending a private message to a player who has never been on the server

source_string: §cYou have no one to reply to.
translation: §cУ вас нет сообщений, на которые можно ответить.
context: Message that appears after using reply command when has no one to reply to
Hover message that displays on the received private message
Message that appears after sending a message to yourself
Hover message that displays on saved note
Title message that appears after using command /pm notes
Message that appears after using command /pm notes with no saved notes
Hover message that displays on left arrow in notes list
Hover message that displays on right arrow in notes list
Message that appears after using notes search command when no notes was found
Message that appears after using notes search command when notes found
Message that appears after deleting note with index
Message that appears after deleting notes with range
Message that appears after trying to do something with note with index, but note does not exist
Message that appears after note with index was pinned
Message that appears after note with index was unpinned
Message that appears after clearing notes list
Message that appears after adding a player to ignore list
Message that appears after removing a player from ignore list

source_string: §cYou cannot message §b%1$s§c, as they are ignoring you.
translation: §cВы не можете отправить сообщение игроку §b%1$s§c, потому что он добавил вас в черный список.
context: Message that appears after trying to send a private message to a player, that added you to ignore list

source_string: §cYou cannot send messages to §b%1$s§c because you are ignoring them.
translation: §cВы не можете отправить сообщение игроку §b%1$s§c потому что добавили его в черный список.
context: Message that appears after trying sending message to a player, that you added to ignore list
Message that appears after enabling notifications sound
Message that appears after disabling notifications sound

source_string:
§6/pm notification [on/off] §f- Toggle notification sounds
§6/pm read §f- Read offline messages
§6/pm history §f- View history of last 20 messages
§6/pm history clear §f- Clear messages history
§6/pm notes §f- View your saved notes
§6/pm notes clear §f- Clear notes
§6/pm notes remove <index> §f- Remove note with index
§6/pm notes remove <from> <to> §f- Remove notes in range
§6/pm notes pin <index> §f- Toggle note pin
§6/pm notes search <text> §f- Search for notes
§6/msg <player> <message> §f- Send a private message
§6/msg <your_nickname> <message> §f- Save a note
§6/reply <message> §f- Reply to the last received message
§6/ignore <player> §f- Ignore or unignore a player
translation:
§6/pm notification [on/off] §f- Переключение звука уведомлений
§6/pm read §f- Прочитать оффлайн сообщения
§6/pm history §f- Посмотреть историю последних 20 сообщений
§6/pm history clear §f- Очистить историю сообщений
§6/pm notes §f- Посмотреть сохраненные заметки
§6/pm notes clear §f- Очистить заметки
§6/pm notes remove <index> §f- Удалить заметку
§6/pm notes remove <from> <to> §f- Удалить заметки в диапазоне
§6/pm notes pin <index> §f- Закрепить/открепить заметку
§6/pm notes search <text> §f- Поиск по заметкам
§6/msg <player> <message> §f- Отправить личное сообщение
§6/msg <your_nickname> <message> §f- Сохранить заметку
§6/reply <message> §f- Ответить на последнее полученное сообщение
§6/ignore <player> §f- Добавить/удалить игрока в черный список
context: Help message that contains all the basic commands of the mod
